help.short: Name of the network security group.
Name of the network security group rule.

commands.name: delete

help.short: Name of the network security group.
Name of the network security group rule.

commands.confirmation: Are you sure you want to perform this operation?

help.short: Name of the network security group.
Name of the network security group rule.
Allowed values: Allow, Deny.
Rule description.
Allowed values: Inbound, Outbound.
Rule priority, between 100 (highest priority) and 4096 (lowest priority). Must be unique for each rule in the collection.
etwork protocol this rule applies to.  Allowed values: *, Ah, Esp, Icmp, Tcp, Udp.

Space-separated list of CIDR prefixes or IP ranges.  Alternatively, specify ONE of 'VirtualNetwork', 'AzureLoadBalancer', 'Internet' or '*' to match all IPs. Besides, it also supports all available Service Tags like 'ApiManagement', 'SqlManagement', 'AzureMonitor', etc.

Space-separated list of CIDR prefixes or IP ranges. Alternatively, specify ONE of 'VirtualNetwork', 'AzureLoadBalancer', 'Internet' or '*' to match all IPs. Besides, it also supports all available Service Tags like 'ApiManagement', 'SqlManagement', 'AzureMonitor', etc. Default: *.
Space-separated list of application security group names or IDs. Limited by backend server, temporarily this argument only supports one application security group name or ID.
Port or port range between 0-65535. Use '*' to match all ports.
Space-separated list of ports or port ranges between 0-65535. Use '*' to match all ports.  Default: 80.
Resource ID.
The type of the resource.

Space-separated list of CIDR prefixes or IP ranges. Alternatively, specify ONE of 'VirtualNetwork',                                      'AzureLoadBalancer', 'Internet' or '*' to match all IPs. Besides, it also supports all available Service Tags like 'ApiManagement', 'SqlManagement', 'AzureMonitor', etc.

Space-separated list of CIDR prefixes or IP ranges. Alternatively, specify ONE of 'VirtualNetwork', 'AzureLoadBalancer', 'Internet' or '*' to match all IPs. Besides, it also supports all available Service Tags like 'ApiManagement', 'SqlManagement', 'AzureMonitor', etc. Default: *.
Space-separated list of application security group names or IDs. Limited by backend server, temporarily this argument only supports one application security group name or ID.
Resource ID.
Resource location.
Resource tags.
Port or port range between 0-65535. Use '*' to match all ports.
Space-separated list of ports or port ranges between 0-65535. Use '*' to match all ports.  Default: *.
